main event: A series of UFO sightings occurred over Fontana and La Jolla, California on August 22, 1956.
interesting points: Witnesses described one object as a round size of a pea with a brilliant red light and a red tail,The second sighting mentioned an object 3 inches in length with a brilliant red color and a hazy tail,In another sighting, two round objects were reported with yellow white lights flying in formation,The length of observation varied from 5 to 10 minutes,The sightings were evaluated but classified as Unidentified or Confirmed (U/C).
sighted object: multiple objects with varying sizes and colors, including red and yellow lights
location: Fontana and La Jolla, California, USA
